column3: > When salvaging a wallet, the only things that matter are the private keys. It is not necessary to attempt to deserialize any other records, especially if those records are corrupted too.\n\nWhat about scripts, can't they be critical as well to spend utxos?

> What about scripts, can't they be critical as well to spend utxos?\n\nThere are basically two types of scripts that we store: 1) watchonly imports, and 2) the segwit scripts for our keys. For watchonly imports, I don't really think that these are necessary to keep as presumably there is some place else that has those scripts.
